front.title: The ANTACID Replication Service: Rationale and Architecture

abstract.t: This memo presents the ANTACID Replication Service, which replicateshierarchically named repositories of XML documents for business-critical, internetworked applications.ASCII and HTML versions of this document are available athttp://www.codeontheroad.com/papers/draft-schwartz-antacid-service.txt and http://www.codeontheroad.com/papers/draft-schwartz-antacid-service.html, respectively.
